metadata.title: CVE-2014-8763 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
DokuWiki before 2014-05-05b, when using Active Directory for LDAPauthentication, allows remote attackers to bypass authentication via apassword starting with a null (\0) character and a valid user name, whichtriggers an unauthenticated bind.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8763` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20140929.a-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20140929.a-1').
